name: A Date With Jake
description:
You're on a date with a guy you met online.

He grabbed your attention because of his interesting look, try to get to know him and you might discover something unexpected.

 - Customizable main character name

- Gender-neutral main character

-6 different endings (I say 6 but there's kind of 1 main ending, but still play the other endings because.... I tried)

-Downloadable Walkthrough! (I get it.)

*********************************************************

******************************************************************

All Art and Writing are by me! Also, this is my first official game (yayayayaay), let me know how it went for you.

I really hope you enjoy! If you want, follow my Twitter and Instagram, and I have a Redbubble for stickers and such. I'll probably upload some assets as stickers soon if you're up for that. Thanks for reading! :D
